about:
I am a graduate from Singapore Management University, with a major in Information Systems. I derive great satisfaction from utilizing my knowledge in computer science to build innovative products. 

During my leisure time, I thoroughly enjoy delving into and experimenting with emerging technologies. Which is why recently, I undertook an exciting project of developing a DIY smart home system, integrating various automations with my smart home devices.

An immense passion of mine is coffee; I consider myself a true connoisseur. I take pleasure in brewing my own traditional Nanyang Coffee at home and am always eager to discover new coffee shops or cafes. If you have any recommendations for traditional coffee or cafes, feel free to reach out!

In addition, I have a strong affinity for watching dramas, encompassing various genres such as Chinese Wuxia/Historical dramas, American Sitcoms, and Korean Romcoms. Without further ado, here are my top 5 drama recommendations:

dramas.name: Story of Yanxi Palace (延禧攻略)
The Deer and the Cauldron (鹿鼎记)
